extracted_playbook.title: Update WibuKey Runtime for Windows
extracted_playbook.description: Update WibuKey Runtime for Windows to V6.70 or later version on affected Windows client installations where WibuKey Dongles are used.

extracted_playbook.title: Protect Network Access
extracted_playbook.description: Protect network access to devices with appropriate mechanisms as a general security measure.

extracted_playbook.title: Configure IT Environment According to Siemens Guidelines
extracted_playbook.description: Operate devices in a protected IT environment by configuring according to Siemens' operational guidelines for industrial security and following recommendations in the product manuals.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Perform proper impact analysis and risk assessment prior to deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Recommended Cybersecurity Strategies
extracted_playbook.description: Implement recommended cybersecurity strategies for proactive defense of ICS assets, as detailed in CISA's guidance and best practices.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Suspected Malicious Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Follow established internal procedures to report suspected malicious activity to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.
